entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023
